description: This file defines Backbone.Marionette views for a TodoMVC application, including item view, list view, and list body view, with event handling and filtering logic.

classes.name: TodoMVC.TodoView
classes.description: View for individual todo item, handles display, editing, toggling, and deletion.

classes.name: TodoMVC.ListView
classes.description: Main list view managing collection rendering, filtering, and toggle-all functionality.

classes.name: TodoMVC.ListViewBody
classes.description: Collection view for rendering the list of todo items with filtering support.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of the todo model.

methods.name: onEditClick
methods.description: Enters editing mode for the todo item.

methods.name: onEditFocusout
methods.description: Saves or deletes the todo item based on input when editing loses focus.

methods.name: onEditKeypress
methods.description: Handles keypress events for editing, including Enter and Escape keys.

methods.name: setCheckAllState
methods.description: Sets the toggle-all checkbox based on whether all todos are completed.

methods.name: onToggleAllClick
methods.description: Sets all todo items to completed or active based on toggle.

methods.name: onRender
methods.description: Renders the list view and its child views.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the list view, setting up event listeners for filter changes.
